actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from Army, OMB.

official_title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 relating to the determination of the non-Federal share of the costs of certain flood control projects.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to credit non-Federal interests for eligible local improvements to certain flood control projects in Texas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 relating to the determination of the non-Federal share of the costs of certain flood control projects.
